turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Prem Chopra.
turn.1: What happened in Prem Chopra's third year on film?
turn.2: On the sets of "Woh Kaun Thi?" which had Manoj Kumar as lead hero, Prem met Manoj for the first time.
turn.3: What was the outcome of this?
turn.4: Manoj offered Prem a positive role in "Shaheed", for which Manoj was the presenter.
turn.5: What other films did he star in?
turn.6: During the shooting of "Main Shadi Karne Chala" someone suggested that he become a villain.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: He continued working with The Times of India, when he was already a part of box office hits like "Nishan", "Sikandar E Azam" in 1965 and "Sagaai, Mera Saaya" in 1966.
turn.9: Did he play any other roles?
turn.10: After "Teesri Manzil" and "Upkaar", he was flooded with films as a villain.
turn.12: After "Upkaar" in 1967, he left The Times of India to concentrate solely on acting.
